creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey
description: shawl, fringed doshalla type, of sheer white wool printed in green, red and blue. Deep end borders carry pattern of slender palmettes filled with conventionalized blossoms. Main field has all-over pattern of triple leaved shrubs springing from vase-shaped motifs and framed with trailing leaves. At intervals throughout the field a narrow silk stripe has been woven into the ground of the shawl. Selvedge sides, silk fringe at ends.
title: Shawl
